<small>Aramaic form: [[H6433]]</small>
 <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎פֶּה‎</span><sub>485</sub> **noun masculine**<sup>[[Josh.9.2|Josh 9:2]]</sup> ==mouth== (probably biliteral [<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎פו‎</span>, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎פי‎</span>] [[BDB#Sta|Sta]]<sup>§ 183</sup>; Late Hebrew = Biblical Hebrew; Phoenician <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לפי‎</span> ***according to***; Assyrian <abbr title="transliteration"><u>***pû, mouth;***</u></abbr> Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">, <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">, <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">; Ethiopic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">; Syriac <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***according to***; but also Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">, <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">, <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">, Biblical Aramaic <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎פֻּם‎</span>, [[BDB#Tg|ᵑ7]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎פּוּמָא‎</span>; Syriac <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">; Mandean <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎פומא‎</span> [[BDB#Nö|Nö]]<sup>M § 87</sup>); — absolute <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎פ‎</span> [[Exod.4.10|Exod 4:10]] +, construct <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎פִּי‎</span> [[Isa.1.20|Isa 1:20]] +; suffix 1 singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎פִּי‎</span> [[Gen.45.12|Gen 45:12]] +, 2 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎פִּיךָ‎</span> [[Gen.41.40|Gen 41:40]] +, 3 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎פִּיו‎</span> [[Gen.25.28|Gen 25:28]] +, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎פִּיהוּ‎</span> [[Exod.4.15|Exod 4:15]] +, 3 masculine plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎פִּיהֶם‎</span> [[Judg.7.6|Judg 7:6]] +, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎פִּימוֺ‎</span> [[Ps.17.10|Ps 17:10]] + 2 t., etc.; plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎פִּיּוֺת‎</span> [[Prov.5.4|Prov 5:4]], <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎(שְׁנֵי) פֵיוֺת‎</span> [[Judg.3.16|Judg 3:16]], <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎פִּיפִיּוֺת‎</span> [[Isa.41.15|Isa 41:15]]; [[Ps.149.6|Ps 149:6]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎פִּים‎</span> [[1Sam.13.21|1Sam 13:21]] (corrupt, see [[BDB#Dr|Dr]] and others); — 

**1. a.** ***mouth***, of man, organ of eating and drinking [[Gen.25.28|Gen 25:28]]; [[Judg.7.6|Judg 7:6]]; [[1Sam.14.26|1Sam 14:26]]; [[1Sam.14.27|1Sam 14:27]]; [[Neh.9.20|Neh 9:20]]; [[Prov.19.24|Prov 19:24]] = [[Prov.26.15|Prov 26:15]] +; figurative as finding things sweet [[Job.20.12|Job 20:12]]; [[Ps.119.103|Ps 119:103]] figurative of earth [[Gen.4.11|Gen 4:11]], swallowing Korah, etc. [[Num.16.30|Num 16:30]]; [[Num.16.32|Num 16:32]]; [[Num.26.10|Num 26:10]]; [[Deut.11.6|Deut 11:6]] figurative also of <abbr title="transliteration"><u>Sh®°ôl</u></abbr>, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וּפָֽעֲרָה פִיהָ‎</span> [[Isa.5.14|Isa 5:14]], compare [[Ps.69.16|Ps 69:16]]. 
$\quad$ $\quad$ **b.** external organ, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וַיָּשֶׂם פִּיו עַלפִּֿיו‎</span> [[2Kgs.4.34|2Kgs 4:34]]; [[Prov.30.20|Prov 30:20]] of kissing [[1Kgs.19.18|1Kgs 19:18]]; [[Song.1.2|Song 1:2]], <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וַתִּשַּׁק יָדִי לְפִי‎</span> [[Job.31.27|Job 31:27]] compare phrase <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שִׂים יָד עַלפֶּֿה‎</span> (of keeping silence) [[Judg.18.19|Judg 18:19]]; [[Mic.7.16|Mic 7:16]]; [[Job.21.5|Job 21:5]], compare [[Job.29.9|Job 29:9]]; [[Job.40.4|Job 40:4]]; [[Prov.30.32|Prov 30:32]] of mocking triumph <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎פָּעַר עָלַי בְּפ‎</span> [[Job.16.10|Job 16:10]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עַל‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הִרְחִיב פ‎</span> [[Ps.35.21|Ps 35:21]]; [[Isa.57.4|Isa 57:4]], also <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎רָחַב פִּי עַל‎</span> [[1Sam.2.1|1Sam 2:1]]. 
$\quad$ $\quad$ **c.** of <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎י‎</span> in theoph., sending out fire [[2Sam.22.9|2Sam 22:9]] = [[Ps.18.9|Ps 18:9]]. 

**2. a.** ==much oftener, as organ of speech, of man:== <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎פ‎</span> speaks [[Gen.45.12|Gen 45:12]]; [[2Sam.1.16|2Sam 1:16]]; [[Isa.9.16|Isa 9:16]]; [[Job.9.20|Job 9:20]]; [[Job.15.5|Job 15:5]]; [[Job.15.6|Job 15:6]]; [[Ps.37.30|Ps 37:30]] +; speak <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎בְּמוֺפִֿי‎</span> [[Job.19.16|Job 19:16]] open <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎פ‎</span>, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אֶליֿ‎</span> [[Judg.11.35|Judg 11:35]]; [[Judg.11.36|Judg 11:36]], absolute [[Job.3.1|Job 3:1]]; [[Job.33.2|Job 33:2]] +; shut <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎פ‎</span> (be silent) [[Isa.52.15|Isa 52:15]], compare <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎חָשַׂךְ פ‎</span> [[Job.7.11|Job 7:11]], and (of iniquity, personified) <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎קָצַף פ‎</span> [[Job.5.16|Job 5:16]]; [[Ps.107.42|Ps 107:42]] guard <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎פ‎</span>, [[Prov.13.3|Prov 13:3]] (<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נָצַר‎</span>), [[Prov.21.23|Prov 21:23]] (<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שָׁמַר‎</span>), compare <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שָׁמַר פִּתְחֵי פ‎</span> [[Mic.7.5|Mic 7:5]], also [[Ps.39.2|Ps 39:2]] (see  <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שׁמר‎</span>); words, etc., are in (<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ב‎</span>) mouth [[2Sam.17.5|2Sam 17:5]]; [[2Sam.18.25|2Sam 18:25]]; [[Deut.30.14|Deut 30:14]]; [[1Kgs.17.24|1Kgs 17:24]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שִׂים דְּבָרִים בְּפ‎</span> [[2Sam.14.3|2Sam 14:3]]; [[2Sam.14.19|2Sam 14:19]]; [[Exod.4.15|Exod 4:15]], also (God subject) [[Num.22.38|Num 22:38]]; [[Num.23.12|Num 23:12]]; [[Num.23.16|Num 23:16]] +; of utterance <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יָצָא מִפּ‎</span> [[Judg.11.36|Judg 11:36]]; [[Num.30.3|Num 30:3]]; [[Num.32.24|Num 32:24]];  +; depart from mouth (cease to be mentioned) <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מוּשׁ מִפּ‎</span> [[Josh.1.8|Josh 1:8]]; [[Isa.59.21|Isa 59:21]], compare <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נִכְרַת מִפּ‎</span> [[Jer.7.28|Jer 7:28]], <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לֹא יִשָּׁמַע עַלפִּֿיךָ‎</span> [[Exod.23.13|Exod 23:13]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אִמְרֵי פ‎</span> [[Deut.32.1|Deut 32:1]] ***words of my mouth***, so [[Job.8.2|Job 8:2]]; [[Ps.19.15|Ps 19:15]]; [[Ps.54.4|Ps 54:4]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎דְּבְרֵי פ‎</span> [[Ps.36.4|Ps 36:4]]; [[Eccl.10.12|Eccl 10:12]] of agency, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎כְּפּ‎</span> ***by the mouth of*** [[2Chr.36.21|2Chr 36:21]]; [[2Chr.36.22|2Chr 36:22]] = <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מִפּ‎</span> [[Ezra.1.1|Ezra 1:1]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎דִּכֶּר פִּיו עִםפִּֿיו‎</span> [[Jer.32.4|Jer 32:4]] ***speak mouth to mouth*** = [[Jer.34.3|Jer 34:3]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎פ‎</span> = ***speech, sayings*** [[Isa.29.13|Isa 29:13]]; [[Ps.49.14|Ps 49:14]]; [[Eccl.10.3|Eccl 10:3]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎כְּבַד פ‎</span> [[Exod.4.10|Exod 4:10]] ***heavy of speech*** (not eloquent); <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אֶהְיֶה עִםפֿ‎</span> v[[Exod.4.12|Exod 4:12]] v[[Exod.4.15|Exod 4:15]], i.e. aid thee in speaking; <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יִהְיֶהלְּֿךָ לְפ‎</span> v[[Exod.4.16|Exod 4:16]] ***he shall be mouth for thee***; <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מִפִּיו יִקְרָא אֵלַי‎</span> [[Jer.36.18|Jer 36:18]], i.e. dictate; <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎כָּתַב מִפּ‎</span> see  <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎כָּתַב‎</span> **1 b** (3); bad qualities ascribed to it, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עִקְּשׁוּת פ‎</span> [[Prov.4.24|Prov 4:24]]; [[Prov.6.12|Prov 6:12]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎פִּי תַהְפֻּכוֺת‎</span> [[Prov.8.13|Prov 8:13]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎פֶּה חָלָק‎</span> [[Prov.26.28|Prov 26:28]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אַלתַּֿגְדֵּל פ‎</span> [[Obad.1.12|Obad 1:12]], compare [[Mic.6.12|Mic 6:12]]; [[Ezek.35.13|Ezek 35:13]]. 
$\quad$ $\quad$ **b.** as laughing [[Job.8.21|Job 8:21]]; [[Ps.126.2|Ps 126:2]] panting [[Ps.119.131|Ps 119:131]]. 
$\quad$ $\quad$ **c.** of God; his mouth speaks [[Isa.1.20|Isa 1:20]]; [[Isa.40.5|Isa 40:5]]; [[Jer.9.11|Jer 9:11]] +; he speaks <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎בְּפ‎</span> [[1Kgs.8.15|1Kgs 8:15]]; [[1Kgs.8.34|1Kgs 8:34]] word proceeds <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מִפּ‎</span> [[Deut.8.3|Deut 8:3]]; [[Isa.45.23|Isa 45:23]] +; <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎פֶּה אֶלפֶּֿה אֲדַכֵּר כּוֺ‎</span> [[Num.12.8|Num 12:8]] he creates <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎בְּרוּחַ פִּיו‎</span> [[Ps.33.6|Ps 33:6]] he executes judgment <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎כְּשֵׁבֶט פִּיו‎</span> [[Isa.11.4|Isa 11:4]] especially = ***command:*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עָבַר אֶתפִּֿי י‎</span> [[1Sam.15.24|1Sam 15:24]]; [[Num.14.41|Num 14:41]], compare [[Num.22.18|Num 22:18]]; [[Prov.8.29|Prov 8:29]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎פ‎</span> (<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אֶתֿ‎</span>) <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מָרָה‎</span> [[1Sam.12.14|1Sam 12:14]]; [[1Sam.12.15|1Sam 12:15]]; [[Num.20.24|Num 20:24]]; [[1Kgs.13.21|1Kgs 13:21]] +; compare **6 d. d.** ==of idols==, [[Ps.115.5|Ps 115:5]]; [[Ps.136.16|Ps 136:16]]; [[Ps.136.17|Ps 136:17]]. 
$\quad$ $\quad$ **e.** of musical instrument = sound [[Amos.6.5|Amos 6:5]] (compare **6 d**). 

**3.** of animals: bird [[Gen.8.11|Gen 8:11]] (carrying), [[Isa.10.14|Isa 10:14]] (chirping); ass [[Num.22.28|Num 22:28]] (speaking); bear, lion [[1Sam.17.35|1Sam 17:35]] (seizing), [[Amos.3.12|Amos 3:12]] (***id.***), hippop. [[Job.40.23|Job 40:23]] (drinking), crocodile [[Job.41.11|Job 41:11]]; [[Job.41.13|Job 41:13]] (breathing flame); also of human foes, under figure of ravenous beasts [[Ps.22.22|Ps 22:22]]; [[Ezek.21.27|Ezek 21:27]]; [[Ezek.34.10|Ezek 34:10]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎פָּצָה‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עַל‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎פ‎</span> [[Ps.22.14|Ps 22:14]]; [[Lam.2.16|Lam 2:16]]; [[Lam.3.46|Lam 3:46]] hence of ***edge*** of sword, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎חֶרֶב פִּיּוֺת‎</span> [[Prov.5.4|Prov 5:4]] ***a sword with edges*** (in simile), = <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ח‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎פִּיפִיּוֺת‎</span> [[Ps.149.6|Ps 149:6]] compare [[Judg.3.16|Judg 3:16]] see also **6 c** (2), below; <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎בַּעַל פִּיפִיּוֺת‎</span> [[Isa.41.15|Isa 41:15]], of <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מוֺרַג‎</span>. 

**4.** ***mouth*** = opening, orifice; of well [[Gen.29.2|Gen 29:2]]; [[Gen.29.3|Gen 29:3]] (twice in verse); [[Gen.29.8|Gen 29:8]]; [[Gen.29.10|Gen 29:10]] cave [[Josh.10.18|Josh 10:18]]; [[Josh.10.22|Josh 10:22]]; [[Josh.10.27|Josh 10:27]] ravine, abyss [[Jer.48.28|Jer 48:28]] (si vera lectio, compare [[BDB#Gie|Gie]]); also of <abbr title="transliteration"><u>Sh®°ôl</u></abbr> [[Ps.141.7|Ps 141:7]] of a sack [[Gen.42.27|Gen 42:27]]; [[Gen.43.12|Gen 43:12]]; [[Gen.43.21|Gen 43:21]]; [[Gen.44.1|Gen 44:1]]; [[Gen.44.2|Gen 44:2]]; [[Gen.44.8|Gen 44:8]] ephah [[Zech.5.8|Zech 5:8]] high-priest's robe [[Exod.28.32|Exod 28:32]] + 5 t., compare probably [[Ps.133.2|Ps 133:2]] tunic [[Job.30.18|Job 30:18]] of a round opening also [[1Kgs.7.31|1Kgs 7:31]] (3 t. in verse) (on text and meaning see [[BDB#Benz|Benz]] [[BDB#Kit|Kit]]); of ***mouth*** of Nile [[Isa.19.7|Isa 19:7]] (others ***brink***); gate of city [[Prov.8.3|Prov 8:3]] (but read perhaps <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לִפְנֵי‎</span>, see Toy). 

**5. a.** ***extremity, end*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎פֶּה לָפֶה‎</span> ***from end to end***, of a temple [[2Kgs.10.21|2Kgs 10:21]] city [[2Kgs.21.16|2Kgs 21:16]], <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מִפֶּה אֶלפֶּֿה‎</span> of land [[Ezra.9.11|Ezra 9:11]]. 
$\quad$ $\quad$ **b.** = portion, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎פִּי‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שְׁנַיִם‎</span> [[Deut.21.17|Deut 21:17]]; [[2Kgs.2.9|2Kgs 2:9]]; [[Zech.13.8|Zech 13:8]]. 

**6.** with prepositions: — 
$\quad$ $\quad$ **a.** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אֶל פִּי‎</span>, see below **d** (2). 
$\quad$ $\quad$ **b.** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎כְּפִי‎</span>: 
$\quad$ $\quad$ $\quad$ (***a***) ***according to the command of***, [[1Chr.12.23|1Chr 12:23]] 
$\quad$ $\quad$ $\quad$ (***b***) ***according to the mouth of***, i.e. ***in proportion to*** (compare Assyrian <abbr title="transliteration"><u>***ki-i pi-i,***</u></abbr> [[BDB#Dl|Dl]]<sup>HWB 325</sup>), [[Exod.16.21|Exod 16:21]] they gathered it <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אִישׁ כְּפִי אָכְלוֺ‎</span> each ***in proportion to*** his eating ([[Exod.16.16|Exod 16:16]] v[[Exod.16.18|Exod 16:18]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לְפִי‎</span>), [[Lev.25.52|Lev 25:52]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎כְּפִי‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שָׁנָיו‎</span> ***according to*** the number of his years (compare v[[Lev.25.16|Lev 25:16]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לְפִי‎</span>); [[Num.6.21|Num 6:21]]; [[Num.7.5|Num 7:5]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אִישׁ כְּפִי עֲבֹדָתוֺ‎</span> (so [[2Chr.31.2|2Chr 31:2]]), [[2Chr.7.7|2Chr 7:7]]; [[2Chr.7.8|2Chr 7:8]]; [[2Chr.35.8|2Chr 35:8]] (all [[BDB#P|P]]); [[Job.33.6|Job 33:6]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הֵןאֲֿנִי כְפִיךָ לָאֵל‎</span> I am ***in the proportion of*** thee as regards God, i.e. I stand towards God even as thou dost. As **conjunction**, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎כְּפִי‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אֲשֶׁר‎</span>, [[Mal.2.9|Mal 2:9]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎כְּפי אֲשֶׁר אֵינְכֶם שֹׁמְרִים אֶתדְּֿרָכַי‎</span> ***accusative as***ye do not keep, etc.; and without <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אשׁר‎</span> [[Zech.2.4|Zech 2:4]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎כְּפִי אִישׁלֹֿא נָשָׂא ראֹשׁוֺ‎</span> ***in such proportion that*** none did lift up his head (but [[BDB#We|We]] [[BDB#Now|Now]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אֲשֶׁר‎</span> for <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אִישׁ‎</span>, that it, Judah, did not, etc.). 
$\quad$ $\quad$ **c.** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לְפִי‎</span>, nearly the same with <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎כְּפִי‎</span> (see  <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לְ‎</span> **5 i** ***b***), but more common (compare Aramaic <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎לְפוּם‎</span>, <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">): (1) [[Gen.47.12|Gen 47:12]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לְפִי הַטָּ֑ף‎</span>, [[Exod.12.4|Exod 12:4]] ye shall compute <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אִישׁ לְפִי אָכְלוֺ‎</span> each ***according to*** his eating (according to the quantity which his family will consume), [[Exod.16.16|Exod 16:16]]; [[Exod.16.18|Exod 16:18]]; [[Lev.25.16|Lev 25:16]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לְפִי רֹב הַשָּׁנִים‎</span>, v[[Lev.25.16|Lev 25:16]] v[[Lev.25.51|Lev 25:51]]; [[Lev.27.16|Lev 27:16]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לְפִי זַרְעוֺ‎</span>, [[Num.26.54|Num 26:54]]; [[Josh.18.4|Josh 18:4]]; [[1Kgs.17.1|1Kgs 17:1]] except <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לְפִי דְבָרִי‎</span>, [[Hos.10.12|Hos 10:12]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎קִצְרוּ לְפִי חֶסֶד‎</span> (\|\| <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לִצְדָקָה‎</span>), [[Prov.12.8|Prov 12:8]]; [[Prov.27.2|Prov 27:2]]: followed by infinitive [[Num.9.17|Num 9:17]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לְפִי הֵעָלוֺת הֶעָנָן‎</span> = ***accusative as*** the cloud was lifted up, [[Jer.29.10|Jer 29:10]]. (2) in the phrase <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לְפִי חֶרֶב‎</span> ***according to the mouth***, or ***measure***, of the sword, i.e. as the sword devours, without quarter, [[Gen.34.26|Gen 34:26]]; [[Exod.17.13|Exod 17:13]]; [[Num.21.24|Num 21:24]] + often 
$\quad$ $\quad$ **d.** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עַל‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎פִּי‎</span>: (1) ***according to*** (<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עַל‎</span> **1 f** ***a***) ***the mouth of***, i.e. 
$\quad$ $\quad$ $\quad$ (***a***) the command of, [[Gen.41.40|Gen 41:40]]; [[Gen.45.21|Gen 45:21]]; [[Exod.17.1|Exod 17:1]]; [[Exod.38.21|Exod 38:21]]; [[Num.3.16|Num 3:16]]; [[Num.3.39|Num 3:39]] + (especially [[BDB#P|P]]), [[2Kgs.23.35|2Kgs 23:35]] (<span class="bdbLangGreek">β</span>) the evidence or sentence of, [[Deut.17.6|Deut 17:6]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עַלפִּֿי עֵד אֶחָד‎</span>, [[Deut.19.15|Deut 19:15]]; [[Deut.21.5|Deut 21:5]] (on <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עַלפִּֿי הַנָּ֑בֶל‎</span> [[Amos.6.5|Amos 6:5]], see **2 e** above). (***2***) ***according to the measure of, in accordance with***, [[Gen.43.7|Gen 43:7]] we told him <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎על פי הדברים האלה‎</span> ***according to*** these words (i.e. the questions Joseph asked), [[Exod.34.27|Exod 34:27]] ***in accordance with*** these words, [[Lev.27.8|Lev 27:8]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עלפֿי אשׁר‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תַּשִּׂיג יַד הנֹּדֵר‎</span> ***according to*** what the hand of the vower can reach to, v[[Lev.27.18|Lev 27:18]] (compare <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לְפִי‎</span> [[Lev.25.16|Lev 25:16]]; [[Lev.25.51|Lev 25:51]]), [[Deut.17.10|Deut 17:10]]; [[Deut.17.11|Deut 17:11]]; [[2Sam.13.32|2Sam 13:32]] (but see  <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שׂוּמָה‎</span>), [[Prov.22.6|Prov 22:6]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎חֲנֹךְ לַנַּעַר על פי דרכו‎</span>. In the same sense <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אֶל פִּי‎</span>, [[Josh.15.13|Josh 15:13]]; [[Josh.17.4|Josh 17:4]]; [[Josh.21.3|Josh 21:3]].
